data: European Commission, Joint Research Centre (JRC), Institute for Energy and Transport, Sustainable Transport Unit
Supply and maintenance of up to 2 torque measurement systems (TMSs) for the measurement of the direct torque at the driven axle/s of heavy duty vehicles (HDVs)
